name: Destination Titan
description:
You and a friend are on a mission to Titan.  One of you will pilot a capsule down to the surface while the other assists from a space station orbiting above.  Keep in communication at all times!

NOTE: For the client player, you can adjust the height of the environment to the correct height by standing up straight and then pressing the menu button on your Vive controller.

The pilot position was designed with a reclining chair in mind (for best experience, use a "Zero Gravity Chair" which can be found at many popular retailers), but other setups can work fine too.  Just place the ring of your Vive controller upside-down at the middle of the point in your seat where your back meets your rear end and press the menu button.  This will align the bend in the virtual chair with the one in your real-world chair.
